title: Clubhouse with Fireplace - Assigned, Covered Parking - Dry Sauna
posting_body: To learn more, contact us today.
Sundale Apartments in Fremont, CA, offer something for everyone.
Our contemporary apartment rentals offer luxury amenities, upscale in-unit features, and a comfortable community for your lifestyle.
Come home to your thoughtfully designed 1- or 2-bedroom apartment in Fremont, CA.
Contact a leasing specialist at Sundale Apartments today to learn more and schedule a tour – rent your home without compromise.
We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a pet rent of $50 per pet.
Pet deposit is $500 for 1 pet and $750 for 2 pets.
Please call for complete pet policy information.
**Prices change daily and are subject to change based on availability, lease start date, and lease term.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Please contact our office for a customized quote.
